name: Prison Arena
description:
You are a prisoner in some medieval European empire. You have been sentenced to death. So you are sent to an arena to fight. In each round, you will have to fight against some other prisoner. If you kill the opponent, you will have to fight another prisoner(your health won't regenerate). If you die, it's over. Your death is inevitable. Can you delay the inevitable?

Use A to move left and D to move right.

Use Esc to pause

Use M to use shield

Use space to attck

Use shift to select next weapon and control to select previous weapon
